wikipedia_page.main: Bodfan (or Bodfaen) is a Welsh saint in the Catholic and Anglican churches.

response: * Venerable Bodfan (Bobouan), patron saint of Abern in Gwynedd in Wales (7th century)Great Synaxaristes:  Ὁ Ὅσιος Βοδφανὸς ἐξ Οὐαλίας. 2 ΙΟΥΝΙΟΥ. ΜΕΓΑΣ ΣΥΝΑΞΑΡΙΣΤΗΣ.
* Bodfan, to whom the church at Aber, in Gwynedd, is dedicated.
